message: QPIDJMS-365 Polish the logging a bit and prevent edge case NPE

QPIDJMS-227 Fix NPE on close of Anonymous producer	

When anonymous relay is not supported the producer close can NPE when
the producer cache is not enabled.
QPIDJMS-307: avoid NPE during declare rejection, ensure the AMQP session is closed before JMS createSession throws, correct exception message.

QPIDJMS-243 Fix potential NPE on close of resource

On close of a not fully initialized connection resource it could
encounter an NPE because the connection session was not created.

QPIDJMS-123 Add additional protections from possible NPE on concurrent
access.
update HelloWorld example to prevent NPE if the message is not received

Just use collections and always return empty ones to avoid any NPE
issues
Add additional check to ensure that when the value is null we don't NPE
NO-JIRA: increase receive timeouts to be more lenient of slower CI boxes, move assertions to prevent NPE
QPIDJMS-45: move the cancellation into the executor so it occurs earlier, and additionally avoids a potential NPE

QPIDJMS-207 Handle null message passed to send calls

Throw the correct exception when a null message gets passed to a send
method (MessageFormatException) instead of waiting to hit an NPE

QPIDJMS-125 Fix an potential NPE when a TX Discharge fails with rejected
that has a null error.  Fix issue with auto-starting new TX after commit
or rollback fails.  Adds some tests to cover the above plus moves TX
tests into their own JUnit test.
